amendment.description: Amendment sought to fund the New England National Scenic Trail at $300,000 within the Operation of the National Park System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 241 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Himes.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 241 (Roll no. 418).
